long_desc.thetext:
Latest upstream release: 5.3
Current version/release in Fedora Rawhide: 5.1-3.fc20
URL: http://drupal.org/project/zen

Please consult the package updates policy before you issue an update to a stable branch: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Updates_Policy

More information about the service that created this bug can be found at:
https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Upstream_release_monitoring

drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.fc19 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 19.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.fc19

drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.fc18 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 18.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.fc18

drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.el6

drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.el5 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 5.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.el5

Package drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.fc18:
* should fix your issue,
* was pushed to the Fedora 18 testing repository,
* should be available at your local mirror within two days.
Update it with:
# su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=updates-testing drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.fc18'
as soon as you are able to.
Please go to the following url:
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2013-14442/drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.fc18
then log in and leave karma (feedback).
drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.fc18 has been pushed to the Fedora 18 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
drupal7-theme-zen-5.3-1.fc19 has been pushed to the Fedora 19 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

drupal7-theme-zen-5.4-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-theme-zen-5.4-1.el6

drupal7-theme-zen-5.4-1.el5 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 5.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-theme-zen-5.4-1.el5
drupal7-theme-zen-5.4-1.el5 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 5 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
drupal7-theme-zen-5.4-1.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
